name: getAuthenticationProvider
description: Retrieves the details of an existing authentication provider.

$ul: **active**: The active status of the authentication provider (default: true)
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
**name**: The name associated with the authentication provider.
**organization_id**: The id from the Organization the authentication provider belongs to.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**settings**: The settings associated with the authentication provider.
**assertion_consumer_service_url**: The Assertion Consumer Service URL for the service provider (Telnyx).
**idp_cert_fingerprint**: The certificate fingerprint for the identity provider (IdP)
**idp_cert_fingerprint_algorithm**: The algorithm used to generate the identity provider's (IdP) certificate fingerprint (default: sha1)
**idp_entity_id**: The Entity ID for the identity provider (IdP).
**idp_sso_target_url**: The SSO target url for the identity provider (IdP).
**name_identifier_format**: The name identifier format associated with the authentication provider. This must be the same for both the Identity Provider (IdP) and the service provider (Telnyx).
**service_provider_entity_id**: The Entity ID for the service provider (Telnyx).
**short_name**: The short name associated with the authentication provider. This must be unique and URL-friendly, as it's going to be part of the login URL.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
